sendMessages.label: Matakin izini na buƙatar aika sako
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 yana nufin cewa dukkan mambobi na iya aika saƙonni, kuma mafi girma lambar yana nufin cewa ana buƙatar isa izini

invite.label: Leaukar matakin da ake buƙata don gayyatar sabbin mambobi
invite.tooltip: Saita wanda zai iya gayyatar sabbin membobi zuwa dakin

kick.label: Kick Exarfin Izinin da ake buƙata
kick.tooltip: Saita wanda zai iya fitar da mambobin dakin

ban.label: Yinin da aka ba da izini don toshe membobin
ban.tooltip: Saita wanda zai iya toshe membobin daki

roomSettings.label: Gyara matakin izinin da aka buƙata na saitunan dakin
roomSettings.tooltip: Saita wanda zai iya canza saitunan dakin

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Matsakaicin izinin izini: 0-100, mafi girma lambar yana nufin mafi girma izini ana buƙatar

toast.error: Ba a yi nasarar sabunta saitin izini ba
